effect_json.outcome_text: SUN in the eleventh house, representing gains, friendships, and aspirations tends to support professional development and career direction, public recognition and respect, family dynamics and home life. The way this influence manifests depends on the overall chart context and other planetary placements. As with all astrological influences, individual circumstances and free tends to play important roles.

variant_meta.certainty_note: Converted from understood meaning. conditional influence.
